data.text: Yahweh, I have come to you to be protected;
Listen to me, and save me right now!
Yes, you are like my huge rock and my fort;
You are the one who protects me,
Yahweh, you are a God who can be trusted,
Yahweh, I hate those who worship useless idols,
I will be very glad [DOU] because you faithfully love me.
You have not allowed my enemies to capture me;
But now, Yahweh, be kind to me again
I have become very weak because I am so miserable,
All of my enemies make fun of me,
People have forgotten me like they forget people who are dead.
I have heard people slandering me,
But Yahweh, I trust in you.
My whole life [MTY] is in your hands;
Be kind to me
Yahweh, I call out to you,
I desire that you will cause people [MTY] who tell lies to be unable to speak.
You have stored up many blessings for those who revere you.
You hide people in your presence where it is safe,
Praise Yahweh!
I was afraid, and I cried out, “I have been separated from Yahweh!”
You people who belong to Yahweh, love him!
You who confidently expect Yahweh to do great things for you,
